location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tahran [Tehran] to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tahran [Tehran] to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, requesting to provide funds from the Presidency's account, for the payment of 15,000 Eyn Piasters to Hajee Mohammed Hossein Khan Ameen ed Dowlat.
